text: phir jab ismaeel apane baap ke saath daud dhoop karane laga to (ek dapha) ibaraaheem ne kaha beta khoob main (vahee ke zariye kya) dekhata hoon ki main to khud tumhen zibaah kar raha hoon to tum bhee gaur karo tumhaaree isamen kya raay hai isamaeel ne kaha abba jaan jo aapako hukm hua hai usako (be taammul) keejie agar khuda ne chaaha to mujhe aap sabr karane vaalon mein se paege
